content: When updating the nightly toolchain using rustup, do we get the very latest clippy or does it require that the clippy subtree is synced? Some bugs have been fixed in rust-lang/rust-clippy two days ago but cargo clippy using the up-to-date nightly toolchain seems to still trigger the bug.

You get the subtree that is in the rust repo, when you install Clippy with rustup. I will do the sync today though, so you'll have those fixes by tomorrow or Saturday, depending on how fast the sync goes through the bors queue
Samuel Tardieu has marked this topic as resolved.
